comp-kolhybzy.html:
Do I need a wedding planner? 

 

As your wedding planner I will save you a lot of time and stress. I have a wealth of knowledge and experience with 10 years in the events industry, so with my network of trustworthy suppliers I will find the  best suppliers to suit you and your wedding. It takes on average 200 hours to plan a wedding (for many the process taking over a year), that is a lot of time so it is important you don't feel stressed out or overwhelmed by it all. I will be your friend and trusted confidant throughout taking away all the stress so you can really relax and enjoy the whole experience knowing you will be in safe hands on the day.

 

What sort of weddings do you work on?

 

My services are completely bespoke so I take your vision for your day and turn it into a reality. If you want an elegant  stately home wedding, a beautiful  glass house venue, a  stunning marquee wedding or a rustic barn wedding I can create that. If you are looking for a very traditional church wedding or want to steer away from tradition that is fine too, I love variety!

 

Will you be there on the wedding day?

 

Yes!  I will be there with my clipboard and schedule in hand managing the events of the day, liaising with suppliers,  assisting your guests and ensuring everything flows seamlessly. I always keep a low profile too. This will allow you to completely relax and enjoy creating unforgettable memories without worrying or stressing about the next part. 

 

Where are you based? 

​

I’m based on the London - Kent border, predominantly working throughout London and the South East, but I do love to travel creating beautiful celebrations anywhere in the UK.

 

How much do your services cost? 

 

I have three different service options, so do take a look at my service page to give you an idea of what I offer. Following a consultation I will create a bespoke  quote tailored to you, but the page does offer guide costs to give you an idea.

 

How many weddings do you plan a year?

 

There is no set number, but I do only plan a limited number of full planning weddings a year in order to keep my service personal and allow me to look  after you properly. Also with partial planning and on the wedding day coordination, dates get confirmed well in advance, so I do advise whichever service you are interested in to get in touch as soon as possible.

 

I’m interested, what's next?

 

The next step is to arrange a discovery call to chat about what service you are interested in and if we are likely a good fit. Following this we would arrange to meet (or have a video call) for complimentary consultation, during this I will ask you lots of questions about you, your style, your likes, your tastes and your vision for the wedding. Following the consultation I will put together a detailed bespoke proposal personal to you.

​

Do you have any other questions about how I can create the wedding of your dreams? Head over to my contact page using the button below, catch me in my inbox on hello@yourstoryevents.co.uk or call on 07469942646 for a chat! 

 

​

​

​

seo.description: Wedding and event planner and designer telling your story through thoughtful, beautiful design. Giving you an easy and enjoyable planning experience and an amazing day filled with unforgettable memories.
